course.subject: COMP
course.name: Deep Learning for Computer Vision
course.description: The impact of computer vision has become increasing relevant in our daily life, with applications ranging from content-based retrieval, image understanding, to cartography, medicine, drones, and self-driving cars. Recent developments in neural network (aka "deep learning") approaches have greatly advanced the performance of these state-of-the-art visual recognition systems. This course will investigate common deep learning architectures with a focus on learning end-to-end models for computer vision tasks. For third and fourth year students only.
course.prerequisites: (COMP 2012 OR COMP 2012H) AND (COMP 3711 OR COMP 3711H)

reviews.author: Dipsy
reviews.comment_content:
其實就copy and paste Standford CS231n

可以去官網睇吓啱唔啱口味再讀
http://cs231n.stanford.edu/
reviews.comment_teaching:
CK 有啲口吃，開頭聽起來會唔慣。佢有時會串下其他CS course，有時自嘲人工唔夠自己學生高，有時搞吓爛GAG，聽佢講課對比聽lecture video別有一番風味，不過學生出席率唔高。如果你GPA高佢會對你另眼相看(利申唔係最高果批)
CK風格：最後一堂俾考試第一頁
reviews.comment_grading:
PAx4: 60%
Midterm: 12%
Final: 40%

注意一份PA同個midterm 一個weighting，絕對唔好輕視PA，而且幾乎全世界滿分，成敗得失全看Final

另外要做Bonus，CK將Bonus最高果位由A推上A+，其他人再跟住拉上去。好似就92% A+，我88% A-，對比某J___ K___ Machine Learning 90%都得B+抵讀好多啦
reviews.comment_workload:
PA 完一份就要開始做另一份，仲要等佢train，比較chur，但勝在github有大把source，copy and paste就可以拎到最少9成分數。

(因為揾得太多source，發現啲source都係互相抄咋，識揾一定揾左邊Bonus滿分果位，因為Bonus係無咩source架)

reviews.author: billy1624
reviews.comment_content:
Directly copy from Stanford CS231n see http://cs231n.stanford.edu/ for details.

All the assignments, teaching materials (lecture slides) all from CS231n.
reviews.comment_teaching:
Teaching pace is too fast, rush to complete all the lecture slides.

The lecture video on http://cs231n.stanford.edu/ is better, explained more clearly and in details.
reviews.comment_grading: Not too bad, if you complete all the assignments on time and do more research on the course project.
reviews.comment_workload:
3 programming assignments, each have 2 weeks time to complete.

1 course project, self-proposed topic; have proposal report, progress report & final report to submit

reviews.author: cdbn
reviews.comment_content:
这门课的主要内容:
midterm前:
- KNN, linear classifier
- Image features, optimisation (SGD)
- Backprop, MLP
- CNN
- Activation function, dropout, batch normalisation
- Optimisation (momentum, RMSprop, Adam), transfer learning

midterm后:
- Deep learning software
- CNN architecture (AlexNet, VGG, GoogLeNet, ResNet)
- RNN, LSTM, attention
- Detection and Segmentation (R-CNN, fast R-CNN, YOLO)
- Visualising CNN (saliency, guided backprop, gradient ascent), adversarial example, deep dream, neural text synthesis, neural style transfer
- Generative model(pixelCNN, pixelRNN, variational auto encoder, GAN)
- Reinforcement learning (Q-learning, policy gradient)

这门课的lecture note都直接使用Stanford CS231n，所以素质非常高。然而，这门课注重width而不是depth，很多概念都是简单带过和provide公式罢了（比如说到了variational autoencoder和reinforcement learning部分，notes里介绍了大量公式，但explanation不多，所以很多都看不明白）。

这门课教了非常非常多知识，所以很难一一去深入了解。而且lecture note很多时候给的资料并不够充足，所以要深入了解的话，一定要自己上网多找资料。

无论是对之前有自学过ML或完全没ML经验的人，都一定会获益良多。
reviews.comment_teaching: 教授教书很热情，考试前也会给提示。
reviews.comment_grading:
midterm: mean 33/40，highest: 40.5
final: mean 93.4/140，highest 127
本人: assignment全满，midterm 35.5, final 104，bonus 9/35，分数排名为全班第22/62 —> A-
reviews.comment_workload:
assignment 1～3都是用Stanford CS231n的，只有最后一个reinforcement learning不是。认真做assignment的话，真的可以学很多东西，也会对上课教的知识有更深入的了解。

教授依旧使用bonus制度，建议大家多做bonus刷分。
